text: The following is a list of paintings by Italian Rococo painter Giambattista Pittoni, one of the most important artist of the eighteenth century in Europe. Giambattista Pittoni lists 247 extant and 117 lost, missing or destroyed works. Some of his works are listed below. The artist's works have never signed and dated.
